title: On the Origin of Words in Mirado
author: Fibon Arrel
notes: Fibon's foundational pebble-school text. Argues words come from an ancient place.

title: The Dissolution of Meaning
author: Eulr Voss
notes: Eulr's masterwork. Codified water-school position. Words dissolve into seventy pools.

title: On the Seventy Pools
author: Eulr Voss
notes: Extension of dissolution theory to Mirado's physical infrastructure.

title: Reflections at the Fountain
author: Eulr Voss
notes: Eulr's late philosophical poetry. Written at the muddy fountain.

title: Against the Stone-Carriers
author: Yasho Krent
notes: Yasho's first major attack on stone-school philosophy.

title: Word-Evaporation: An Extension
author: Vera Losh
notes: Extended water-school to include evaporation as well as dissolution.

title: Memory as Illusion
author: Vera Losh
notes: Argues memory deceives us about the permanence of words.

title: The Final Dissolution
author: Nessa Bright
notes: Definitive water-school statement. Demolishes stone-school claims.

title: On the Permanence of the Uttered
author: Grigsu Haldo
notes: Grigsu's major philosophical work. Words are harder than stone.

title: The Binary World Puzzle
author: Fibon Arrel
notes: Fibon's puzzle treatise. Connects pebbles to counting to word-origins.

title: The Pools and the Pebbles
author: Kell Sundar
notes: Applied pebble theory to Mirado's seventy pools. Controversial.

title: On Lending and Return
author: Kell Sundar
notes: Developed Fibon's lending concept for pebble-school.

title: Revival of the Pebble
author: Denna Vox
notes: Attempted Capital revival of pebble-school. Limited success.

title: On Creature Classification
author: Boffa Trent
notes: Boffa's taxonomic framework. Foundational for later work.

title: Maps and Memory: A Wanderer's Notes
author: Vagabu Olt
notes: Bagbu's ongoing memoir. Still being added to. Pickbox cart travels.

title: Western Quarry Survey Report
author: Hesta Vorn
notes: Official report from Fourth Expedition. Extensive creature documentation.

title: Sixth Quarry Creature Census
author: Hesta Vorn
notes: Systematic creature census from Sixth Expedition.

title: Final Survey Notes
author: Hesta Vorn
notes: Notes from Tenth Expedition. Hesta's final fieldwork before retirement.

title: The Stakdur Encounter
author: Pollux Dann
notes: Account of the Ninth Expedition disaster. Written before Pollux's death.

title: Water-School Taxonomy
author: Renna Caw
notes: Applied dissolution principles to creature classification.

title: Eleventh Survey Methodology
author: Renna Caw
notes: Documented new water-school approach to creature observation.

title: History of the Capital Senate
author: Mink Pavar
notes: Mink's political history. Some sections later disputed as inaccurate.

title: On Casting Stones
author: Renna Gast
notes: Codified stone-casting practice after conversations. Village tradition.

title: Survey Report: Yeller Quarry 869
author: Grigsu Haldo
notes: Grigsu's expedition report. The journey that changed him.

title: Silence and the Stone
author: Hamund Bress
notes: Northern stone-school philosophy. Silence as empty space between words.

title: Frozen Words: A Northern Meditation
author: Hamund Bress
notes: Argued words could be frozen in northern climates. Eccentric but influential.

title: Toward a Reconciliation
author: Oben Marsh
notes: Attempted to reconcile stone-school with empirical observation.

title: The Evidence of Words
author: Oben Marsh
notes: Further attempts at empirical stone-school. Largely unsuccessful.

title: Literalism and the Dens
author: Callis Fenn
notes: Foundational literalist text. All sides of symbol must be visible.

title: The Symbol Laid Bare
author: Callis Fenn
notes: Continuation of literalist philosophy. Written before disappearance.

title: Literalism After Callis
author: Roth Fenn
notes: Roth's continuation after brother's disappearance. Less radical.

title: Numbers and Words
author: Fibon Arrel
notes: Fibon's late work connecting counting to word-origins.

title: The Conquest of Dens: A History
author: Mink Pavar
notes: History of Dens conquest. Later suspected of fabrications.

title: Meaning and Dissolution
author: Yasho Krent
notes: Yasho's theory of meaning within water-school framework.

title: The Rise of the Archive District
author: Mara Yent
notes: History of how the archive district developed near the Senate.

title: The Senate and the Expeditions
author: Mara Yent
notes: Political history of expedition funding and oversight.

title: Questions About the Archives
author: Mara Yent
notes: Mara's unfinished investigation into archive forgeries. She died before completing.

title: Capital Political Factions
author: Donal Crest
notes: Comprehensive history of political factions in the Capital.

title: The Senator and the Siege
author: Donal Crest
notes: Political analysis of Senate support for the Mirado siege.

title: Chronicle of the Ninth Expedition
author: Pell Sontar
notes: Pell's chronicle up to the stakdur attack. He died in the encounter.

title: The Testimony of Sonter
author: Anonymous
notes: Account of the Boss's expedition disaster. Recorded by chief of police's daughter.

title: Maps of the Dens Border
author: Tomas Grell
notes: Old Grell's mapping notes. Foundational for later cartography.

title: Dead River Exists
author: Vagabu Olt
notes: Bagbu's Dead River survey report. Confirmed the region exists.

title: Northern Route Atlas Notes
author: Senna Grell
notes: Notes from Northern Route Mapping expedition.

title: Yeller Quarry Route Compendium
author: Senna Grell
notes: Comprehensive Quarry route documentation.

title: Dead River Eastern Reach Notes
author: Gareth Poll
notes: Extended Bagbu's earlier Dead River mapping.

title: Unmapped Settlements
author: Gareth Poll
notes: Documented settlements not on any previous maps.

title: Dispatches from Mirado: Volume I
author: Colonel Viragu
notes: Colonel's dispatches from the siege. Still being added to.

title: Dispatches from Mirado: Volume II
author: Colonel Viragu
notes: Continued dispatches. Quality declining as Colonel's enthusiasm fades.

title: Letters from the Lieutenant
author: Fyncho Delt
notes: Fyncho's correspondence. Reveals ambiguous loyalty.

title: Dens Border Investigation Report
author: Captain Vrell
notes: Confirmed densmuck encroachment. Several hundred yards since last survey.

title: The Final Push: Planning Documents
author: Colonel Viragu
notes: Planning for renewed assault on Mirado.

title: The Nature of Argument
author: Yasho Krent
notes: Yasho's theory of debate and dissolution.

title: On Archive Licensing
author: Oric Valdun
notes: Legal framework for archive shop licensing.

title: The Round Window: Legal History
author: Oric Valdun
notes: History of the round window requirement for licensed shops.

title: Expedition Contract Forms
author: Oric Valdun
notes: Standard contract forms for expeditions.

title: Manuscript Provenance Standards
author: Pella Valdun

title: Lineage Disputes: Case Studies
author: Hork Staven

title: Expert Testimony in Lineage Cases
author: Hork Staven
notes: Guidelines for expert witnesses in lineage disputes.

title: Tripas Trade Route Survey
author: Foreman Hask
notes: Mapped safe trade routes to Tripas.

title: Northern Village Census
author: Administrator Venn

title: Creatures of the Western Quarry
author: Wen Torval

title: The Lower Marshes
author: Wen Torval
notes: Wen's final notes. Incomplete due to his death.

author: Jara Torval

title: Safe Routes Through the Quarry
author: Jara Torval
notes: Memorial Survey documentation of safe routes.

title: Notes on Yeller
author: Venn Horak

title: Quarry Marginalia
author: Venn Horak
notes: Additional notes from the Scavenger. Condition poor.

title: The Practice of Stone-Casting
author: Renna Gast
notes: Detailed description of stone-casting ritual. Village origins.

title: Dannkit's Linguistic Notes
author: Dannkit Rosh
notes: Stonebreaker's notes on language. Nearly deaf perspective.

title: On Yeller Numbers
author: Grigsu Haldo
notes: Grigsu's analysis of Yeller's connection to prime numbers.

author: The Inventor

author: Vagabu Olt

author: Mink Pavar

title: Final Refutations
author: Yasho Krent
notes: Yasho's last major philosophical work. Comprehensive attack on stone-school.

title: Water-School Foundations

notes: Pedagogical text for water-school students.

title: The Pebble Returns

title: Modern Quarry Assessment

author: Ulla Vant
